We pledge to get back to you ASAP on all your payment questions so that we can help you finalize your order right away.ShopFreely does not charge sales tax to orders shipped outside of Massachusetts. With No Sales Tax, the price you see on our all our pages and in your shopping cart is the final price you will pay. We are dedicated to providing our customers with straight-forward and upfront prices with no surprise fees, taxes, or surcharges. It’s just another reason why you always shop freely with ShopFreely! For Massachusetts shipping addresses, the exact tax will be shown on your checkout page after you enter your shipping address, and is always equal to 6.25% of the order total. We aim to be as upfront as possible because we dislike surprise fees and surcharges and we know you do to! If you ship outside of Massachusetts, sales tax does not apply to anything you purchase from ShopFreely. ShopFreely is not responsible for individual State sales tax reporting laws as they relate to online purchases but we encourage customers to look into your State’s regulations, if any apply. Some States may bill you directly for a “Use Tax” and you are responsible for any and all “Use Taxes” billed directly to you by your State if it is one of the few States that elects to charge such a tax.Hassle-Free Returns at ShopFreely! At ShopFreely, we stand by our products and our customers. We know how important a hassle-free return policy is when shopping online, especially when buying furniture & decor with style for your home or personal space. Feel confident shopping with ShopFreely knowing that you can return the product(s) you purchase for any reason at all, as long as it is within 30 days of the product(s) delivery to you. Almost all products on Shopfreely.com are returnable. The few exceptions include unsealed mattresses, assembled or modified products, and clearance merchandise which will note this within the product details. All returns must be unused and shipped back in the original packaging to the warehouse address from which the order was shipped. To initiate a return, send an email to us so that we can provide you with a Return Authorization Number which is to be noted on the outside of the package. The Return Authorization Number allows the warehouse to identify your return when it arrives and helps us credit you as quickly as possible. Returns sent back without the Return Authorization Number noted could be missed or delayed. Upon inspection of the return, you will receive a full refund via the payment method that was originally used to make the purchase (i.e. Credit Card, PayPal, etc.). If there are any problems with your order at the time of delivery, please contact our customer service department right away so that we can ensure that replacement parts are sent out at no charge to you. If we cannot replace the missing or damaged parts, we will have the shipping carrier pick up your product(s) and a new order will be shipped out to you. Please note that the original packaging must always be used when returning product(s) back to us. Cancelling your Order At ShopFreely, we pride ourselves on fast shipping. We aim to ship all orders within 24 business hours but some products on Shopfreely.com might take longer due to the custom nature of the product or due to low stock levels. Please keep in mind that once your order has shipped out, it cannot be cancelled. If you refuse a delivery, the round-trip shipping costs will be deducted from your refund. If you need to cancel your order, please contact us as soon as possible so that our customer service team can attempt to cancel your order and refund you right away. Refunds and Credits Refunds or credits can be expedited through proper communication with our ShopFreely customer service team before shipping the merchandise back to us. You should expect to receive your refund within 3-5 days of receipt of the returned merchandise. In many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. We know how important your refund is to you, and we work hard to process all refunds as soon as the returned merchandise has arrived back and been inspected. At ShopFreely, we know how important it is to provide our customers with a safe and secure shopping experience. We want all our customers to be free from worry and have peace of mind while shopping at a trusted and reputable store. We treat the security of your personal information with the utmost care and use only the most state-of-the-art 128-bit hacker-safe SSL encryption to secure all data we collect at ShopFreely. How do you know when your data is secure? At ShopFreely, we guarantee that every transaction made is 100% safe and secure. As soon as you add an item into your shopping cart and proceed to checkout, you will see that the URL in your browser's address bar will begin with “https”, with the extra “s” added to “http”, signifying “secure”. A padlock icon should also appear at the top of your browser. This indicates that you are protected within our 128-bit SSL secure server, where all data is encrypted for optimal security. To further improve our safe and secure shopping and to try to eliminate fraudulent purchases, we require that all credit card orders are accompanied with the correct Card Verification Code (CVV Code).
